name: Passe Monde
description:
Passe Monde is an invitation to walk through several worlds slotted together. You have to gess how to walk by solving little riddles.

Have a nice walk !

This game was made during game jam in Poitiers : "Ceci n'est pas un jeu. "https://itch.io/jam/ceci-nest-pas-un-jeu-2017 Staring Estée Krikorian et Amandine Couespel

Game in french language
